languages.text: {n}Торжествующая ухмылка прорезается на лице Маражая, но ксенос держится на удивление сдержанно, не осмеливаясь прерывать речь неизвестного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Торжествующая ухмылка прорезается на лице Маражая, но ксенос держится на удивление сдержанно, не осмеливаясь прерывать речь неизвестного.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Торжествующая ухмылка прорезается на лице Маражая, но ксенос держится на удивление сдержанно, не осмеливаясь прерывать речь неизвестного.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上洋溢着胜利的笑容，但这位异形依然保持着惊人的镇定，不敢肆意打断这位不知名的发言人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上洋溢着胜利的笑容，但这位异形依然保持着惊人的镇定，不敢肆意打断这位不知名的发言人。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの顔には勝ち誇ったような笑顔が浮かんでいるが、異種族は驚くほど冷静で、正体不明の話者の話に割って入ろうとしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの顔には勝ち誇ったような笑顔が浮かんでいるが、異種族は驚くほど冷静で、正体不明の話者の話に割って入ろうとしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa triunfal florece en el rostro de Marazhai, pero el xenos conserva la calma y no se atreve a interrumpir a su interlocutor desconocido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa triunfal florece en el rostro de Marazhai, pero el xenos conserva la calma y no se atreve a interrumpir a su interlocutor desconocido.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Un rictus triomphant aux lèvres, Marazhai demeure néanmoins parfaitement calme et n'ose pas interrompre l'orateur inconnu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rictus triomphant aux lèvres, Marazhai demeure néanmoins parfaitement calme et n'ose pas interrompre l'orateur inconnu.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst zwar triumphierend, wirkt aber überraschend ruhig und wagt es nicht, den unbekannten Sprecher zu unterbrechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst zwar triumphierend, wirkt aber überraschend ruhig und wagt es nicht, den unbekannten Sprecher zu unterbrechen.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde muradına ermişçesine bir sırıtış belirse de zeno, şaşırtıcı derecede soğukkanlı davranıyor ve konuşmakta olan, kim olduğunu bilmediğin varlığın sözünü kesmeye cüret etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A triumphant grin erupts on Marazhai's face, but the xenos remains surprisingly composed and does not dare to interrupt the unknown speaker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde zafer dolu bir sırıtış beliriyor ancak zeno şaşırtıcı derecede soğukkanlı davranıyor ve konuşmakta olan kim olduğunu bilmediğin varlığın sözünü kesmeye cüret etmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
